page.title: 10Top Hall Farm-Thorpe Salvin
page.content:
Sheet 3.
The corn is sprayed to combat weeds and diseases.{Fertilising}and{spraying continue in small doses through to May. When the soil is dry enough potatoes are planted, spring corn and peas sown.At this time of year work is from 7am to dark. The most interesting time of the year is the{summer}or{harvest}when you see the results of the year's work.Harvest starts with winter barley, followed by oilseed rape,spring barley,oats,peas and winter wheat.Now we work from 7am to 10pm or even midnight if the weather is right and the crops need harvesting. No two days, or two years are the same. The hours depend upon the weather, if it rains it's little,if fine it's as many hours as possible.
